alert.note: Alert for Mitchell (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 4:02PM CDT until March 31 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR EASTERN MITCHELL AND WESTERN HOWARD COUNTIES... At 401 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Riceville, or 12 miles east of Osage, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Riceville around 410 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lylahs Marsh County Park, Saratoga, Meyer, Maple Leaf, and Brownville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
